text: spandex is uncomfortable doesn't only
happen every four years after Vancouver
a lot of people ask me what do you do
until you know the next Olympics I said
we're always competing and always
training we don't really have a break
it's pretty much all year round and
everyday is going going going your
typical short track speed skate is 17
1/2 inch blade the razor sharp so you're
skating up on the ice with the razor's
on your feet oh it is dangerous
underneath our racing suits we're
actually wearing a full Kevlar suit and
it's cut resistant it's not cut proof I
think also the mechanics of your body
everybody's used to the forward motion
and the forward arm swing but where our
legs and everything are going from side
to side we're not going front to back

doesn't he just go why doesn't he just
pass him please understand when we get
